context.p: Assembling your Kawonator espresso machine Your will have the Drip Tray and Water Tank in place when you unpack it from the box. Other elements will be provided in foam packaging and require manual assembly.

step.cmd: Remove the Drip Tray and Water Tank and wash all parts and accessories in warm, soapy water using a non-abrasive washing liquid. Rinse and dry thoroughly.

Insert the Storage Tray into the base of the machine and slide in towards the back wall. This is a convenient location to store spare filters and other maintenance equipment like Kawonator-compatible filter cleaning fluid.
Slide the Drip Tray, with the Drip Tray Full Indicator and Grid in place, into the base of the machine and in front of the Storage Tray.
Slide the Drip Tray, with the Drip Tray Full Indicator and each of its two Grids in place, into the base of the machine and in front of the Storage Tray.
Slide the Water Tank over the Drip Tray and into the front opening of the machine and into position above the Storage Tray. Ensure the Water Tank aligns flush with the sides of the machine.

taskbody.postreq: Before first use we strongly recommend to perform two complete water brewing operation (without ground coffee), to ensure that all internal piping has been preheated.
